item.title: Aligning Text to Image Models With Human Preferences Using Direct Preference Optimization
item.description: This presentation explores Direct Preference Optimization (DPO), a groundbreaking technique for aligning large-scale generative models with human preferences. We'll cover its theoretical foundations, its application to diffusion-based image models, and what the future holds for this powerful alignment method.

item.title: Actor-Critic vs. Value-Based: Empirical Trade-offs
item.description: An empirical comparison of Value-Based and Actor-Critic reinforcement learning algorithms across discrete and continuous action spaces, analyzing trade-offs in convergence speed, stability, and performance.

item.title: Three Dogmas of Reinforcement Learning
item.description: by David Abel, Mark K. Ho, and Anna Harutyunyan

item.title: ExpGen: Explore to Generalize in Zero-Shot RL
item.description: by Ev Zisselman, Itai Lavie, Daniel Soudry, and Aviv Tamar
